text: Ka'ba-ye Zartosht (Persian: کعبه زرتشت) is the name of a stone square building with steps in the Naqsh-e Rustam compound beside Zangiabad village in Marvdasht county in Fars, Iran. == Other websites == * A guided tour of Ka'ba- ye Zartosht, YouTube (1 min 34 sec). Category:Achaemenid Empire Category:Fars Province Category:Religious buildings and structures in Iran
title: Ka'ba-ye Zartosht
